text: Event notifications changed some time within the past few weeks. Does anyone know how to use the new APIs to get events generated by the shim.SetEvent(string , []byte) method? They used to be in the Block's nonhashdata field, but don't seem to be there anymore.
<@U1WGX02HE>: there is a PR to fix that. we are hoping to get that in soon
so it cannot be done at all at the moment?
